message.entry: Select the type of read operation
Select the MATLAB data type to read
Specify the number of values of the selected Data Type to read
Maximum possible number of values of the selected Data Type that can be read.

entry.note: Retrieves data according to the defined settings

message.entry: Read data using the specified settings

entry.note: Purges all data from input and output buffers

message.entry: "Num Values to Read" value must be scalar, positive, and an integer.
The Read Section Controller needs to be a "matlabshared.transportapp.internal.toolstrip.read.IController".
"Num Values to Read" must be less than or equal to "Values Available".
Unable to read any data for the specified Data Type because "Values Available" is 0.
